tool.name: Xarray Import Data
tool.description: Import a dataset from an OPeNDAP URL and convert it to a local NetCDF file using xarray.

param.name: opendap_url
param.label: OPeNDAP URL
param.help: OPeNDAP URL to a dataset, also see https://docs.xarray.dev/en/stable/user-guide/io.html#opendap

param.name: decode_times
param.label: Decode times
param.help: If true, decode time variables to datetime objects. If false, keep them as raw data.

param.name: decode_cf
param.label: Decode CF conventions
param.help: Whether to decode according to CF conventions

tool.help:
================== Xarray Import Data ==================
**What it does**
Open a dataset from an OPeNDAP URL and convert it to a NetCDF file using xarray.
|
**How to use it**
Pass a valid OPeNDAP URL to the `opendap_url` parameter. The tool will download the dataset and save it as a local NetCDF file.
|
**Links** https://docs.xarray.dev/en/stable/user-guide/io.html#opendap https://www.opendap.org/
